Uses of Class
net.jini.jeri.ssl.AuthManager

  • Packages that use AuthManager 
    Package Description
    net.jini.jeri.ssl
    Provides implementations of Endpoint and ServerEndpoint that use TLS/SSL and HTTPS (HTTP over TLS/SSL) to support invocation constraints.

    • Uses of AuthManager in net.jini.jeri.ssl

      (package private) class  ServerAuthManager
